Nerangs.ab: Y34.20 (mss. 6 40 88. cf. ms. 8 inǧā farārašn ruvānhā ašavān kardan va pateti angārdan (similar 15)):
yeŋ́hē hātąm. tā sar guftan ēn gyāg fraharašn ruwān gyān kardan ud patetīgīh hangārdan
"At yeŋ́hē hātąm, he should (reckon) the frauuaši, the souls and spirits and do the penitence."

Ritual.ab: pad ẏā̊ŋhąmcā kē aētā̊sə tē ātarə zaōθrā̊ ōy ī pēš estēd ān gōwišn kē ātaxš-gāh šōyēd frāz ō ātaxš barēd
At ẏā̊ŋhąmcā, who (should recite) aētā̊sə tē ātarə zaōθrā̊? The one standing before (the fire) should say it. The one who has washed the firestand, he should bring (the offering) to the fire.
pad ẏā̊ŋhąmcā zōt 3 bār angust anda ēd burzist abāz āwarišn
pad yazamide padisxwār abar burzist nihišn
At ẏā̊ŋhąmcā the zōt should bring his fingers three timesto the highest point (over the fire).
At yazamaide he has to put the bowl on the highst point (over the fire).
